candidate Profile Description.summary: Cheng-Chen Huang is a Master's student in Computer Science at Virginia Tech with a background in Computer Science and Management Information System from Soochow University. Experienced in research, teaching, and software development, with skills in Java, Python, C/C++, SQL, NoSQL, JavaScript, HTML, Node.js, and REST API.

education.degree: Bachelor's in Computer Science and Management Information System

activities_and_awards.award: Second prize in 2021 Nationwide Cloud APP Application Idea in Use Competition

activities_and_awards.activity: Member of Virginia Tech Computer Science Student Council
Member of Taiwan Python Line Group Community Manager

experience.title: Research Assistant
responsibilities: Discussed research goals and broke down into stages.
Designed and created ontology database.
Accomplished traditional medicine feature engineering.
Set up Apache cloud server and pushed database to cloud.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant
responsibilities: Analyzed current famous cyber-attacks and trends.
Broke down cybersecurity into several areas.
Defined course objectives with professor.
Created teaching material for cybersecurity course.

projects.title: Recipe Generator
responsibilities: Completed design document, user cases, and Jira schedule.
Designed and initialized the database with MongoDB on AWS.
Set up web application server with Node.js.
Created REST API.
Implemented user login and new user functions.
Implemented recipe generate function.
Tested the system with Postman.

projects.title: New AI Game Hack
responsibilities: Used random real people images to train object detection model.
Used Transfer Learning technique to implement the model in the application.
Used Object Localization technique to get the location and adjusted the parameter of detection.
Calculated the distance based on the x, y, and virtual z-axis to get the relation between screen and mouse input.
Combined the steps above and kinesiology to avoid outlier detection from the game server.

projects.title: Sustainable Renting System
responsibilities: Built a renting system that preserves the environment and people under COVID-19.

projects.title: Cyber Attack Predictive Model
responsibilities: Built a predictive model capable of distinguishing between connections from attackers and normal users.
Analyzed and cleaned the original dataset.
Implemented different algorithms like SVM, decision tree, K-means clustering, etc.
Iterated the evaluation and optimizing model, achieving over 99% accuracy.

projects.title: Movie Recommendation System
responsibilities: Built a movie recommendation system to recommend user based on their history record.
Built models based on different algorithms like model-based ALS Algorithm and content-based algorithm.
Iterated the evaluation and optimizing the model, ended up picking the ALS Algorithm based on the accuracy.

projects.title: Database Management System for United States Patent
responsibilities: Built a webpage using Python Web Flask.
Cleaned and analyzed the over 10-year accumulated data.
Enabled the webpage to select and filter from Database.
Analyzed the data with TF-IDF Algorithm then visualize.
Visualized the data queried by the user.

projects.title: Student Room Rent System Analyzation
responsibilities: Built a webpage using Python Web Flask.
Did the field research.
Created a Fishbone Diagram, Functional Decomposition Diagram, Context Diagram and decided to use top-down design.
Created the Data Flow Diagram and implemented to Microsoft Access.
Defined Database schema and published the system design.

projects.title: Cause of Death Analyzation
responsibilities: Obtained the open data from Taipei government open source.
Used python to clean and format the data.
Analyzed the data.
Visualized the outcome as Bar Graph, Pie Chart, Word Cloud.
